title: Permaban Request
body: I got permabanned today. I don't think it's justified, but I admit I have been very toxic and mean recently. However, this was in very few instances of recent times, and I didn't have a warning at all. More so, I don't think it deserved a permaban. I was toxic in the past, have had multiple suspensions and chat bans, but this caught me completely off guard. I have seen and done worse without punishment, admittedly, and am wondering if I could do anything to repeal it? The link I was given to try combat it just said that everything I wrote was redacted. For context, I've had this account since ~season 1. I've made friends, memories, and its inexplicably a part of my childhood I wish never to lose. Honestly, I wish for a permanent chat ban due to my toxicity, because I feel as if its the most helpful thing. I've spent literal weeks on this game, and with the amount of hours I've poured into it, all of my grinding, how many champions I own, my rarest skins, and all of the money I've spent on this game, I really have can't explain how worried I am. I can't even go back to see my account, it's just been completely dissipated. On top of this, I was banned over very mild toxicity. I may have said people were bad, but that was the extent of it. Can I possible appeal to reduce the punishment?

Context does not matter. You have complete control over what you say in game, and it does not matter whether you reacted to someone or not. Riot does not remove punishments unless they were issued in error, which based on what you are saying is not the case. 

Punishments work in tiers, tier 1 and 2 are chat restrictions (cant remember how many games for some reason), tier 3 is a two week suspension, and then after is a permanent suspension. You can lower your tier with periods of no toxicity, which is probably why you have been suspended multiple times. Anything that can get a chat restriction can get you a permaban, it is just a matter of where you are on the tier.

Also, Riot does not issue permanent chat suspensions. If you want to mute yourself you can drag your chat off screen, resize it in the config files, or remove the key binding for your enter key through a third party application.

As it stands, you have had multiple chances to improve your behavior and you did not.

Context certainly matters, and that's undeniably true. If I'm complaining or appearing to flame, you may not realize it's me complaining about myself, which I don't believe is toxic...

Additionally, on that punishment tier thing, if that's true I'm confused because my last suspension or chat ban might have been over a year ago...

Well, now that I see your logs, this is probably the biggest issue.

Game 1
Racc101: Saaaay %%%%%%!!!

Hate speech escalates you punishment tiers, often a permaban  on sight or at least a two week ban. It was probably your punishment history that escalated it past two week.

And no, context does not matter. It does not matter when or how you say any of what you said, it is still contributing to the negative environment. You should just mute the person, report them after the game, and move on with your life.
Hm. Thanks for the info, I still think I should be able to argue for this case. Your efforts are appreciated tho

You can always make a support ticket.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Wouldn't cross my fingers though.

Riot's A.I algorithms do not understand when someone is being humorous or sarcastic. If you say a racist word, you WILL be banned. End of story.

Best of luck with a new account. I recommend turning off chat completely, if you can't help yourself from raging at people.

If you think you have the balls to think before you type, then I recommend utilizing mental warfare that bypasses the chat detectors.  For example, you can use "?" over and over when people start talking shit to you, or do other things ingame if someone is being a dick or whatever to you (for example, playing support and adc is a dipshit feeder with no brains? stand behind them, wait for them to die then pick up the CS/kills. Tell them "I'm the carry now". Playing top lane and enemy mid keeps roaming but your mid is too stupid to do MIA or follow? Get a chance to go to mid to "gank" and take all his farm" When he complains, go "???".)

This way, the assholes that DO rage (like you have), can be reported and punished by the system, and you get away with the satisfaction of tilting some deadbeat motherfuckers.

Above all else, never EVER type anything toxic in chat, even jokes, even sarcasm, if you can help it. Not even banter.

I just came off a 2 week ban, and realized I had to stop typing whatsoever so I wouldn't get perma'd. Started doing the aforementioned above and now the notifications about my reports sticking someone the D are rolling in sometimes 2 per day (depends on how many games you play a day and how many morons/ragers you gotta report). It's extremely satisfying.
